title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 580.3 - Limitation of issues
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 580.3 - Limitation of issues

State Regulations

The agency may determine to limit the issues to be
considered at the hearing, in which case it will advise the project sponsor of
its determination and the notice of hearing will specify the issues to be
considered. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
580.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
